code: import React from'react';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import{MessageDialog}from'./messageDialog';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Unauthenticated(props){const[userName,setUserName]=React.useState(props.userName);const[password,setPassword]=React.useState('');const[displayError,setDisplayError]=React.useState(null);async function loginUser(){loginOrCreate(`/api/auth/login`);}async function createUser(){loginOrCreate(`/api/auth/create`);}async function loginOrCreate(endpoint){const response=await fetch(endpoint,{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({email:userName,password:password}),headers:{'Content-type':'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}});if((response===null||response===void 0?void 0:response.status)===200){localStorage.setItem('userName',userName);props.onLogin(userName);}else{const body=await response.json();setDisplayError(`âš  Error: ${body.msg}`);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"input-group-text",children:"@"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control",type:"text",value:userName,onChange:e=>setUserName(e.target.value),placeholder:"your@email.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"input-group-text",children:"\uD83D\uDD12"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control",type:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"password"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:()=>loginUser(),disabled:!userName||!password,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>createUser(),disabled:!userName||!password,children:"Create"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageDialog,{message:displayError,onHide:()=>setDisplayError(null)})]});}
